hero.title: Your Mental Health Journey Starts Here
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive support for your well-being with AI-powered guidance, professional therapy, and community connection.

features.moodTrackerDesc: Track your emotional patterns and gain insights into your mental health journey
features.aiChatDesc: Get instant support and guidance from our AI-powered mental health assistant
features.journalDesc: Express your thoughts and track your personal growth journey
features.soundTherapyDesc: Relax with curated audio experiences designed for mental wellness
features.breathingDesc: Learn breathing techniques for stress relief and emotional regulation
features.therapyDesc: Connect with licensed mental health professionals for personalized care
features.screeningDesc: Take evidence-based assessments to understand your mental health status
features.resourcesDesc: Access comprehensive mental health resources and educational content
features.communityDesc: Connect with others on similar mental health journeys

screening.title: Mental Health Screening
screening.subtitle: Take evidence-based assessments to understand your mental health status
screening.phq9Desc: A 9-question depression screening tool used by healthcare professionals
screening.gad7Desc: A 7-question anxiety screening tool for generalized anxiety disorder
screening.aboutAssessmentsDesc: These are validated screening tools used by mental health professionals. Results are for informational purposes only and should not replace professional diagnosis.

moodTracker.title: Mood Tracker
moodTracker.subtitle: Track your daily emotions and discover patterns in your mental wellness journey
moodTracker.howAreYouFeeling: How are you feeling right now?
moodTracker.notePlaceholder: What's contributing to this mood? Any thoughts you'd like to capture?
